name: Hobo Ground Beef and Vegetable Soup
author: Cindy
summary: Here's an old-time hamburger and mixed vegetable soup, made the way Grandma made it...if Grandma had a slow cooker. If you can't go home and check on it on a week day be sure to added extra broth at the beginning. A large bag of frozen mixed vegetables can be used in place of the canned vegetables.
ingredients: 1 (32 fluid ounce) container beef broth, or more if needed
1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
2  potatoes, peeled and cut into bite-size pieces
1 large stalk celery, cut into bite-size pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Stir beef broth, ground sirloin, corn, green beans, peas, tomato sauce, carrots, potatoes, onion, celery, garlic, parsley, celery seed, and bay leaves together in a slow cooker
Check for moisture and add broth as needed
Season with salt and black pepper
